caller_intent: Donette Sikes needs assistance changing workers' comp class codes from 8848 to 8826/8824 after an audit, as her carrier (Paychecks) indicated this requires a new policy.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledged the need to change class codes following a workers' comp audit.
Offered to transfer the caller to a specialized team for policy adjustments.
Provided alternative contact methods (voicemail, email: support@myallianceinsurance.com) in case of transfer failure due to staffing shortages.
summary: Donette Sikes requires help updating workers' comp class codes after an audit, as her carrier indicated this necessitates a new policy. The agent offered to connect her with the appropriate team and provided backup contact options.
